post.text: I love our supporters -- so much spirit! Thank you Cleveland, Ohio --- VOTE TRUMP/PENCE on 11/8/16. Lets WIN & MAKE AMERICA GREAT AGAIN!

comment.author: Kyra
comment.text: I battle for you Mr.Trump everyday. I battle the ignorance of her supporters on all of her web pages. They are morally inept. They have no valid defense for the truth.

replies.author: Joshua
replies.text: Come back Nov 9... Well discuss it over a cup of coffee
